about_the_game:
Fallen Seeds is a science fiction visual novel with elements of a dating sim that follows the adventures of Evod, a special agent of the Earth Empire, during his mission on the enigmatic planet of Ulthar, inhabited by zoomorphic extraterrestrial beings known as Chimy.

This is the first part of an upcoming science fiction trilogy.



Join Evod, who, as he carries out his mission, discovers that the vibrant resort planet has a darker side. An Anomalous Zone resides on the planet, a mysterious and perilous area, drawing the attention and converging interests of powerful Galactic forces.

Entangled in complex political intrigues, you will decide who to ally with and who will become your adversary. Evod must determine what he's willing to sacrifice on his quest for truth, even if it means confronting his long-forgotten past.



The story is driven by your choices
Pick your decisions carefully. The story has many branching plotlines.

Dating sim in space!
One of five charming companions can join you on your adventure if you win her affection. Or would you prefer to travel alone?

Vivid art
A distinctive visual style crafted with meticulous attention to detail. Immerse yourself in a captivating world, brimming with unusual and vibrant locations.

Rich narrative
The story aims to strike a balance between fun and philosophical inquiries. Humor and romance exist alongside drama. The game zeroes in on the personal tales of the protagonists, set against the backdrop of the overarching clash of the galaxy's formidable political forces.

Hand-animated cutscenes
Expressive 2D animations that highlight the narrative's most poignant moments.

Engaging sci-fi setting
Two factions vie for dominance in the galaxy, each with starkly contrasting worldviews and technologies. The Technocratic Earth Empire and the Flock, a biological civilization of beast-like extraterrestrials known as Chimy, are at odds with each other.

Game offers 6 routes. The total text volume reaches 55 thousand words, and a full playthrough, according to our estimates, will take about 6 hours. The game includes more than 10 endings, the exact number of which we prefer to keep secret.

Additionally, you can expect:
  • 23 characters,
  • more than 80 background locations,
  • 23 original music compositions,
  • partial voice acting for all characters.

short_description: As Evod, a special agent of the Earth Empire, you embark on a thrilling adventure to the enigmatic planet of Ulthar, inhabited by the zoomorphic tribe of the Flock, a biotechnological extraterrestrial civilization. Your mission is to unravel an ancient mystery that holds the key to your destiny.
